Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 20.10.27-5, affected by CVE-2022-21698
